learning-code.title: What is blocking from learning code?
learning-code.description: Everyone can learn to code, math skills are not required but depending situation you may need different options.

decided.heading: Haven't you decided yet?
decided.sub_heading: You can try 4Geeks on a free plan
decided.description: We have a free plan for you, with it you can enjoy many of our benefits, including a free feedback session.

faq.label: What happens if I consume all my mentorships or workshop access?
faq.answer: If you have the fly solo plan or the live and with feedback plan, and you consume all your mentorships or workshop access, then you can always buy more for a discounted price for each.

faq.label: On which technologies can I ask for mentoring sessions?
faq.answer: You can always ask for one-on-one mentoring sessions on every course that you have access to. So whether you are doing a JavaScript course or a Python one, you can ask for mentoring sessions.

faq.label: Are the unlimited mentoring sessions over after I finish the bootcamp?
faq.answer: The unlimited access to technical and career mentoring sessions, or unlimited access to workshops, is for life as long as you take part in one of our bootcamps.

faq.label: How does the Job Guarantee work?
faq.answer: The Job Guarantee contract, is only for bootcamps, and it consists of returning your money back if you can't find a job after 6 months, some conditions apply..
